name: zai-tracker
description: CLI tool to track Z.ai GLM Coding Plan usage

scripts.build: bun run build:node && bun run build:statusline && cp dist/index.js tokensight/dist/index.js && cp dist/statusline.js tokensight/dist/statusline.js
scripts.build:node: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.build:statusline: bun build src/statusline/index.ts --outfile dist/statusline.js --target node && chmod +x dist/statusline.js
